content.question: Pictorial records of the MexicaStatues produced by local artists in New SpainHistories written in Spanish and NahuatlA historian examining Mesoamerica in the sixteenth century would best utilize the sources above to analyze which of the following topics?

choices.label: The process of introducing the encomienda system
How Christian ideas were communicated to and understood by Amerindians
Conflicts between the Jesuits and the Franciscans
The extent of the decline of the Amerindian population

content.answer: How Christian ideas were communicated to and understood by Amerindians

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Explain the significance of a source's point of view, purpose, historical situation, and/or audience, including how these might limit the use(s) of a source.
